name: Ring of Eternal Sands
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
